Name: AKOA SECTOR POLO SHIRT
Description: The Akoa Sector polo shirt is perfect for everyday sports wear. The Endura-Dri fabric is a generation of high performance Akoa fabrics designed to cope with the most challenging conditions. The side panels feature an eyelet fabric for cooling comfort.
Details: 100% polyester

Name: AKOA SECTOR POLO SHIRT
Description: The Akoa Sector polo shirt is perfect for everyday sports wear. The Endura-Dri fabric is a generation of high performance Akoa fabrics designed to cope with the most challenging conditions. The side panels feature an eyelet fabric for cooling comfort.
Details: 100% polyester

Name: AKOA SECTOR GIRLS' FIT POLO SHIRT
Description: The Akoa Sector girls' polo shirt is perfect for everyday sports wear. It is a fitted girls' style with an open neck. Age 9/10 has a button to neck fastening. The Endura-Dri fabric is a generation of high performance Akoa fabrics designed to cope with the most challenging conditions. The side panels feature an eyelet fabric for cooling comfort.
Details: 100% polyester

Name: AKOA MULTISPORT SHORT
Description: The Akoa multisport short is perfect for everyday sports wear. Sizes XXS and above feature an elasticated waist with secure drawcord. (* Junior sizes do not include a drawcord.) The Endura-Dri fabric is a generation of high performance Akoa fabrics designed to cope with the most challenging conditions. Suitable for both boys' and girls.
Details: 100% Polyester

Name: AKOA SECTOR HOODY
Description: The Akoa Sector hoody is suitable for both boys' and girls. The side panels are breathable using Endura-Dri fabric. The Endura-Dri fabric is a generation of high performance Akoa fabrics designed to cope with the most challenging conditions.
Details: 65% Polyester, 35% Cotton main body

Name: AKOA SECTOR HOODY
Description: The Akoa Sector hoody is suitable for both boys' and girls. The side panels are breathable using Endura-Dri fabric. The Endura-Dri fabric is a generation of high performance Akoa fabrics designed to cope with the most challenging conditions.
Details: 100% Polyester side panelling

Name: AKOA SECTOR CONTRAST TOP SOCK
Description: The Akoa Sector contrast top sock has an elasticated top that eliminates the need for tie ups and can be worn under or over the knee. The elasticated ankle support helps hold shin pads in place with a padded sole for added comfort. Micromesh foot venting and a flat toe are extra features.
Details: 95% Polyamide, 5% Elastane
